summary.p: Set in the jazz age of the 1920s, the novel is a poignant and tragic love story.
It follows the enigmatic millionaire Jay Gatsby and his obsession with winning back his lost love, Daisy Buchanan.

character.name: Daisy Buchanan
character.description: Beautiful and charming, but also shallow and materialistic.

character.name: Jay Gatsby
character.description: A self-made millionaire with a mysterious past and a penchant for grandeur.

text.p: The story begins with Nick Carraway, a young man from the Midwest, moving to New York City.
He rents a small house in Long Island, which is next to a grand mansion owned by his mysterious neighbor, Jay Gatsby.
Nick and Gatsby become friends, and Nick learns more about Gatsby's past.
Gatsby's obsession with Daisy is revealed, and Nick begins to understand the complexities of their relationship.
